channel.title: FREE 1-Month Club Penguin Membership [[First-Come First-Serve]]
channel.description:
Well, I had about $2.50 and BestBuy had a sale on it and BestBuy has like nothing under 9$...so I just spent it on a club penguin 1 month membership.. Well, I don't play Club Penguin and never will. So I am giving out a free PIN code for a 1-month membership. Here is what the back of the card says:
MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista, Pentium 3 800Mhz processor (P4 1Ghz recommended), 512 MB RAM, 400 MB disk space available 32MB graphics card (64 MB recommended), DirectX 9 or better, or PowerPC 450 MHz or any Mac with an Intel processor, 512 MB RAM, 400 MB disk space available, 32MB graphics card (64MB recommended). INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Go to www.clubpenguin.com/gamecard 2. Scrath off below, and enter the 16 digit PIN NUMBER when and as directed. 3. Select the game you wish to play by clicking on of the "Redeem" buttons. 4. Log-in or follow the steps to create an account and PLAY!"
[b] Remember, this is first come first serve! Don't be upset if the PIN is taken before you![/b] [size=18pt]PIN NUMBER: 4183 1055 3888 3990[/size] Have fun.

item.title: FREE 1-Month Club Penguin Membership [[First-Come First-Serve]]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Well, I had about $2.50 and BestBuy had a sale on it and BestBuy has like nothing under 9$…so I just spent it on a club penguin 1 month membership…

Well, I don’t play Club Penguin and never will. So I am giving out a free PIN code for a 1-month membership.

Here is what the back of the card says:

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista, Pentium 3 800Mhz processor (P4 1Ghz recommended), 512 MB RAM, 400 MB disk space available 32MB graphics card (64 MB recommended), DirectX 9 or better, or PowerPC 450 MHz or any Mac with an Intel processor, 512 MB RAM, 400 MB disk space available, 32MB graphics card (64MB recommended).

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Go to www.clubpenguin.com/gamecard
  2. Scrath off below, and enter the 16 digit PIN NUMBER when and as directed.
  3. Select the game you wish to play by clicking on of the “Redeem” buttons.
  4. Log-in or follow the steps to create an account and PLAY!"

[b]

Remember, this is first come first serve! Don’t be upset if the PIN is taken before you![/b]

[size=18pt]PIN NUMBER: 4183 1055 3888 3990[/size]

Have fun.
